description:
For the last update of 2005, we present you something that we don't usually do.

Actually, I can't recall the last time this has happened. Fox and his buddy Frankie were clubbing one night and decided to head back to their dorm.

Surprisingly, their roommate had left his professional video camera lying out. He usually uses the cam to make skateboarding videos, but on this night, it will be used for something else.

Being the perverted guys that we know and love, Frankie threw the idea to Fox that he film him stroking his cock. Fox, who has already been a stripper, thought it would be a great idea.

So prepare for a great show as captured in true amateur fashion, by the models themselves, as Fox strokes and pokes himself for your, and his, enjoyment.
title: Fox
